column2: The man who put me here went on an expedition to Egypt over 200 years ago. They heard tales of my presence there and went to investigate. Once they found me and my tomb, they forced me back into my sarcophagus with fire. They locked me back in and transported me here. At the time, the only company I had was Melusine and a vampire named Allan. Neither of them, however, are in this section of the prison anymore.
